welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lake Ridge, a charming city known for its beautiful lakes and friendly community! We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Welcome to your home away from home."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines, including Delta, United, and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'DCA Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
